attributes.action: Either charge Sharon Shoesmith with allowing the death of a child and gross negligence, or sack her from her post for her failings in the Baby P case
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/BabyPEnquiry/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
